name: Neon ball (Arina Lender)
description:
Neon ball is a small game made on unreal in a week. The goal was to understand a little how this development software works.

There were three of us in this little project. My role:
- Code the players (shoot, move),
- Code the enemies,
- Implement the other product elements.

This game is a prototype, as said above. So it has various bugs. I posted it only for the curious people of the game play he offers. 

So, thanks for your  understanding and good game.

Created in 2020.
